definitions.text: argue or speak in defense of
examples: She supported the motion to strike

definitions.text: be on the defensive; act against an attack
protect against a challenge or attack
examples: Hold that position behind the trees!
Hold the bridge against the enemy's attacks
The senator said he would oppose the bill

definitions.text: protect or fight for as a champion
be the defense counsel for someone in a trial
examples: Ms. Smith will represent the defendant
